paragraphs.body: This page's creation is a high priority for the fanon community, as clear guidelines are still not set out and we require these guidelines before I can replace the current ${link_0} and ${link_1} with the updated versions found in my sandboxes. This does partly mean we need a resolution on Forum:Fanon Quality Standards. Wjxhuang, the 888th Avatar {Talk} 02:06, 23 July 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: This page's creation is a high priority for the fanon community, as clear guidelines are still not set out and we require these guidelines before I can replace the current Avatar Wiki:Policy and Avatar Wiki:Manual of Style with the updated versions found in my sandboxes. This does partly mean we need a resolution on Forum:Fanon Quality Standards. Wjxhuang, the 888th Avatar {Talk} 02:06, 23 July 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I think this policy page needs a bit of an update. For example, the FanonUC template on pages may result in moving the page to namespace, and also the fact that Fanonhelp template no longer exists. Also, at the bottom of this page you will find a brown box with policy draft in it, would that be placed on this page, or the fanon standards page? Cheers, Rassilon of Old (Talk - TTFF - Teru)  16:50, April 22, 2011 (UTC)
